channel.title: Objects and emotes
channel.description:
Hello moparscape i see some of you are useful posters and i need help. Okay this is whats going to happen. Before i tell you the problem If you don't know the exact answer do not post. Or i'll report it as spam.
I want to recreate Jagex's Hunter. Now I've got the models but i want to add a emote to it. Does anyone know if this is possible. I'm pretty sure it is but i just want other confirmation before i do it tomorrow[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2009, 02:36:32 pm[/size][hr]any suggestions ? please i really need to know this. Today im going to extract models from Jagex

item.title: Objects and emotes
